Package ch.pschatzmann.stocks.accounting

Accounting: Reporting on account and portfolio values
Author:
pschatzmann
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAccount
    Basic account functionality which is needed by the execution and allocations
    IBasicAccount  
    IHistoricValue
    Interface for Value at Date
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    Implementation of Account KPIs for any basic Account.
    BasicAccount
    Trading account which is supporting to record stock trading orders and orders to transfer money in and out of the account;
    HistoricValue
    Record to document the evolution of a value over time
    HistoricValueComparator  
    Portfolio
    Stock Portfolio information for a specific date.
    PortfolioStockInfo
    Individual line of the portfolio which represents the kpis for an individual stock.
    Transaction
    Order to buy or sell an individual stock.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Transaction.Action
    Requested Action
